results.title: Membranous-like glomerulopathy with masked IgG-k deposits in a pediatric patient with juvenile idiopathic arthritis.
results.text_hl: We present a 12-year-old female with systemic @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Juvenile</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001171 @@@juvenile idiopathic arthritis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Juvenile</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001171 @@@sJIA@@@) with persistent non-@DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic@@@ range @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ despite normal kidney function.

citations.NLM: Chati P, Krissberg J, Henriksen K, Nolan B, Harris M. Membranous-like glomerulopathy with masked IgG-k deposits in a pediatric patient with juvenile idiopathic arthritis. Pediatr Nephrol. 2025 Sep 15;():. PMID: 40954329
